pages.text: Having a Wraith properly possess a Black Wolf results in a powerful, and unnatural, creature that can rend your enemies asunder through it's withering claws and curses.

The beast can be healed by feeding it meat much like tamed wolves, and can passively heal if their owner dons a Wild Robe. Right-clicking on them with a Taglock Kit, that has a Tagged creature on it, will cause them to hunt said creature down before returning to their owner once they slay their query.
Mob based on 'Nightmare Stalker' from 'Born In Chaos' mod by 'mongoose_artist'.
